title: Stock Futures Slip, Putting Wall Street on Course to Extend Declines
sub_head: Weak Chinese economic data showed the cost of strict Covid-19 lockdowns
body:
U.S. stock futures edged down, suggesting major indexes will extend the selloff that has pushed the S&P 500 down for six consecutive weeks.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 fell 0.4%. Blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average Futures weakened 0.2% while technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures dropped 0.6%.
